actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 94-460.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors.

summary.text: Revises maximum age requirements and civil service retirement regulations for customs and immigration inspectors.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the retirement of customs and immigration inspectors.
